item.title: Kindness—A Part of God’s Plan
item.description:
Kindness—A Part of God’s Plan by undefined Betty Jo Jepsen, First Counselor, Primary General Presidency given in Session 6 of 160th Semiannual General Conference on Sun Sep 30 1990
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: undefined Betty Jo Jepsen, First Counselor, Primary General Presidency
